issue.title: [Packaging][deb] Add support for Apache Arrow Datasets
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5685](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5685). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5685?focusedCommentId=16869920) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
This software is pre-alpha. I'm not sure it is worth packaging for 0.14 (but it doesn't hurt)

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5685?focusedCommentId=16869937) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
I just want to suppress warnings in .deb build process.

I described this at https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4655#issuecomment-504596042 .

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5685?focusedCommentId=16869981) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4655
